data.title: Xavier University of Louisiana Athletics
data.text:
Yamlak Tsega / XULA Athletics

Men's Track and Field 4/16/2022 9:45:00 PM

Boyd, Alexander earn second-place finishes at SLU meet

Results

HAMMOND, La. — Damoy Boyd and Seth Alexander produced runner-up finishes Saturday for Xavier University of Louisiana's men at the Southeastern Strawberry Relays track and field meet.

Boyd's second-place time of 1 minute, 54.83 seconds in the 800-meter run is XULA's fastest in this event in the last 12 seasons. Boyd was 1.03 seconds from an NAIA nationals B-qualifying mark.

Alexander, previously qualified for nationals with an A-mark in the triple jump, finished second with another A-mark — but not a season best — of 14.59 meters/47 feet, 10 1/2 inches.

Also placing in the top five were Edward Angel in the high jump (fourth place 2.03 meters/6-8) and Blake Harris in the triple jump (fourth, 14.29 meters/46-10 3/4).

This was XULA's fourth meet of the outdoor season and its final one before the Red River Athletic Conference Championships April 29-30 in San Antonio. NAIA nationals will be May 25-27 at Gulf Shores, Ala.

Here are all XULA men's results from the Southeastern Strawberry Relays:

100: Robert Ellis, 23rd in 11.22; Blake Harris, 43rd in 11.92

200: Robert Ellis, 23rd in 22.64; Chase Roberts, 25th in 22.74

400: Chase Roberts, 9th in 49.30

800: Damoy Boyd, 2nd in 1:54.83; Steven Wilson, 23rd in 2:14.46

1,500: Steven Wilson, 23rd in 4:46.13

110 hurdles: Boubacar Sylla, 13th in 15.96; Mauricka McKenzie, 20th in 17.08

400 hurdles: Katembo David, 22nd in 1:08.83; Mauricka McKenzie, 23rd in 1:16.60

Discus: Lewis Wilson, 12th in 36.26 meters/118 feet, 11 inches; Thomas Donald, 20th in 29.03 meters/95 feet, 3 inches

High jump: Edward Angel, 4th in 2.03 meters/6 feet, 8 inches; Kimbimbi Lubuta, 8th in 1.78 meters/5 feet, 10 inches

Javelin: Katembo David, 8th in 39.50 meters/129 feet, 7 inches

Long jump: Seth Alexander, 8th in 6.82 meters/22 feet, 4 1/2 inches; Gustavo Carranza, 10th in 6.76 meters/22 feet, 2 1/4 inches; Katembo David, 15th in 6.50 meters/21 feet, 4 inches; Kimbimbi Lubuta, 19th in 5.91 meters/19 feet, 4 3/4 inches

Shot put: Thomas Donald, 8th in 12.70 meters/41 feet, 8 inches; Lewis Wilson, 9th in 11.98 meters/39 feet, 3 3/4 inches

Triple jump: Seth Alexander, 2nd in 14.59 meters/47 feet, 10 1/2 inches; Blake Harris, 4th in 14.29 meters/46 feet, 10 3/4 inches
